title: Directs the commissioner of education to establish an incentive program for school districts wishing to implement programs of foreign language in the elementary scho
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing the commissioner of education to establish an incentive program for school districts wishing to implement programs of foreign language in the elementary schools and directing the commissioner of education to establish an incentive program for college students wishing to become foreign language teachers; and making an appropriation therefor
